attributes.action: Free bus transport to and from school
attributes.additional_details: Even though most of the time its only £1 there and another £1 back added up that is £10 per week to get to somewhere you legally have to be and thats if you only get 1 bus.
attributes.background: Free bus transport for the school buses at Highschool

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for the same action: 

"Make bus travel free for secondary school students" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715593

"Fund school bus service for all Primary & Secondary state schools students" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732900

"Free bus travel for under 16s" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/740392
